alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Scotts Bluff, southern Sioux and east central Goshen Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 509 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Torrington, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Scottsbluff and Lake Alice around 555 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
